justification: Acknowledges B’s WR depth but misreads B’s beliefs: B trusts consensus and values young ascending WRs—Isaiah Thompson (Tier 2, ascending, friendly playoffs) fits perfectly. Claiming B “lacks a high-ceiling rookie RB” ignores Nick Roberts (Tier 2). Swap is a WR downgrade (Thompson -> Campbell Tier 3) for a lateral RB move (Wright Tier 5 -> Robinson Tier 5). Calling Thompson a “reliable WR1” is inconsistent. Acceptance probability is overstated.
